name: JamRun IPTV
description: JamRun IPTV is the premier IPTV player designed exclusively for the Apple ecosystem. Featuring a stunning glass-styled interface that feels native to iOS and tvOS, JamRun delivers a premium streaming experience without the premium price tag. Unlike other IPTV apps that feel like afterthoughts on Apple devices, JamRun was built from the ground up with Apple's design language in mind. The app requires no account creation, collects zero user data, and offers fast, fluid navigation through your IPTV content. With support for M3U/M3U8 playlists, full EPG integration, and smart category organization, JamRun represents a new standard for IPTV on Apple TV, iPhone, and iPad.
shortDescription: Premium Apple-native IPTV player with stunning glass design
pros: Universal Apple support (iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Mac, Vision Pro)
Fast channel browsing with smart categories
Full EPG and TV guide support
cons: Newer app with growing feature set

faqs.question: Is JamRun IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, JamRun IPTV is completely free with no ads and no subscription required.

faqs.question: Does JamRun support EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, JamRun fully supports EPG (Electronic Program Guide) for viewing TV schedules.

faqs.question: What devices does JamRun work on?
faqs.answer: JamRun works on iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Mac, and Vision Pro - all Apple ecosystem devices.

faqs.question: Does JamRun collect user data?
faqs.answer: No, JamRun has a strict zero data collection policy and requires no account creation.

name: TiviMate
description: TiviMate is the most popular premium IPTV player for Android devices, known for its sleek interface, reliable EPG support, and extensive customization options. It offers both free and premium versions.
shortDescription: Premium IPTV player with EPG and recording

faqs.question: Is TiviMate free?
faqs.answer: TiviMate offers a free version with basic features. Premium features require a subscription at $9.99/year.

faqs.question: Does TiviMate support recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, TiviMate Premium supports DVR recording functionality to save live TV.

faqs.question: What devices does TiviMate work on?
faqs.answer: TiviMate works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, Fire TV, Android TV, and Nvidia Shield.

faqs.question: Does TiviMate have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, TiviMate has excellent EPG integration with customizable TV guide layouts.

name: IPTV Smarters Pro
description: IPTV Smarters Pro is a versatile cross-platform IPTV player supporting Xtream Codes API, M3U playlists, and multiple connections. Available on virtually all platforms.
shortDescription: Cross-platform IPTV player with Xtream support

faqs.question: Is IPTV Smarters Pro free?
faqs.answer: IPTV Smarters Pro offers a free version with ads. The full version costs $5.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Smarters support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Smarters has native Xtream Codes API integration for easy provider setup.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Smarters work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Smarters works on Android, iOS, Firestick, Windows, Mac, and Smart TVs.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Smarters have parental controls?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Smarters includes parental control features to restrict content access.

name: Kodi
description: Kodi is a powerful open-source media center that can be transformed into an IPTV player using add-ons like PVR IPTV Simple Client. Highly customizable with thousands of skins and add-ons.
shortDescription: Open-source media center with IPTV add-ons

faqs.question: Is Kodi free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kodi is completely free and open-source software.

faqs.question: Does Kodi support IPTV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kodi supports IPTV through add-ons like PVR IPTV Simple Client for M3U playlists.

faqs.question: What devices does Kodi work on?
faqs.answer: Kodi works on Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, Linux, Firestick, Apple TV, and more.

faqs.question: Is Kodi difficult to set up for IPTV?
faqs.answer: Kodi requires installing and configuring add-ons for IPTV, which has a learning curve for beginners.

name: VLC Media Player
description: VLC is a free, open-source media player that supports IPTV streaming via M3U playlists. Simple to use but lacks advanced IPTV features like EPG.
shortDescription: Free media player with basic IPTV support

faqs.question: Is VLC free for IPTV?
faqs.answer: Yes, VLC is completely free and open-source with no ads or subscriptions.

faqs.question: Does VLC support EPG?
faqs.answer: No, VLC does not have built-in EPG support. It's designed as a basic media player.

faqs.question: What devices does VLC work on?
faqs.answer: VLC works on Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, and Linux.

faqs.question: Can VLC play M3U playlists?
faqs.answer: Yes, VLC can open and play M3U/M3U8 IPTV playlists directly.

name: GSE Smart IPTV
description: GSE Smart IPTV is a feature-rich IPTV player available on iOS and Android with support for Chromecast, EPG, and multiple playlist formats.
shortDescription: Feature-rich IPTV player with Chromecast support

faqs.question: Is GSE Smart IPTV free?
faqs.answer: GSE Smart IPTV has a free version with ads. The premium version costs $5.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does GSE Smart IPTV support Chromecast?
faqs.answer: Yes, GSE Smart IPTV has built-in Chromecast support for casting to your TV.

faqs.question: What devices does GSE Smart IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: GSE Smart IPTV works on Android, iOS, Apple TV, and Firestick.

faqs.question: Does GSE Smart IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, GSE Smart IPTV supports EPG integration for TV guide functionality.

name: Perfect Player
description: Perfect Player is a set-top box style IPTV player for Android with a clean interface, EPG support, and efficient channel management.
shortDescription: Set-top box style IPTV player for Android

faqs.question: Is Perfect Player free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perfect Player is completely free with no premium version required.

faqs.question: Does Perfect Player have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perfect Player supports EPG for viewing TV program schedules.

faqs.question: What devices does Perfect Player work on?
faqs.answer: Perfect Player works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

faqs.question: Does Perfect Player support recording?
faqs.answer: No, Perfect Player does not have built-in recording capabilities.

name: OTT Navigator
description: OTT Navigator is a powerful IPTV/OTT player with support for Stalker, Xtream, and M3U playlists. Known for its reliability and feature set.
shortDescription: Powerful IPTV player with Stalker and Xtream support

faqs.question: Is OTT Navigator free?
faqs.answer: OTT Navigator offers a free version. Premium features cost $4.99/year.

faqs.question: Does OTT Navigator support Stalker portal?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTT Navigator has native Stalker portal support for IPTV providers.

faqs.question: Does OTT Navigator have recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTT Navigator supports DVR recording functionality in the premium version.

faqs.question: What devices does OTT Navigator work on?
faqs.answer: OTT Navigator works on Android phones, Firestick, and Android TV devices.

name: IPTV Extreme
description: IPTV Extreme is an Android IPTV player with recording capabilities, EPG support, and auto-updating playlists.
shortDescription: Android IPTV player with recording and auto-update

faqs.question: Is IPTV Extreme free?
faqs.answer: IPTV Extreme has a free version with ads. The pro version costs $4.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Extreme support recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Extreme has DVR recording functionality to save live TV.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Extreme auto-update playlists?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Extreme can automatically update your M3U playlists on a schedule.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Extreme work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Extreme works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: Lazy IPTV
description: Lazy IPTV is a simple, lightweight IPTV player for Android devices. Basic but reliable for playing M3U playlists.
shortDescription: Simple and lightweight IPTV player

faqs.question: Is Lazy IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lazy IPTV is completely free to use.

faqs.question: Does Lazy IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: No, Lazy IPTV does not have EPG support - it's designed as a simple, lightweight player.

faqs.question: What devices does Lazy IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: Lazy IPTV works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

faqs.question: Is Lazy IPTV good for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lazy IPTV is very simple and easy to use, making it ideal for beginners.

name: SS IPTV
description: SS IPTV is an IPTV player designed specifically for Smart TVs, particularly Samsung and LG models. Simple playlist loading via web interface.
shortDescription: IPTV player for Samsung and LG Smart TVs

faqs.question: Is SS IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, SS IPTV is completely free to use on Smart TVs.

faqs.question: Does SS IPTV work on Samsung TVs?
faqs.answer: Yes, SS IPTV is available for Samsung Smart TVs through the app store.

faqs.question: Does SS IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: No, SS IPTV does not have built-in EPG support.

faqs.question: How do I add playlists to SS IPTV?
faqs.answer: You can upload playlists through the SS IPTV web interface using your TV's unique code.

name: Smart IPTV
description: Smart IPTV (SIPTV) is a popular IPTV app for Smart TVs with EPG support and playlist upload via MAC address.
shortDescription: Popular IPTV app for Smart TVs

faqs.question: Is Smart IPTV free?
faqs.answer: No, Smart IPTV costs $5.49 one-time payment after a 7-day trial.

faqs.question: Does Smart IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Smart IPTV supports EPG when provided with your playlist.

faqs.question: What Smart TVs does Smart IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: Smart IPTV works on Samsung, LG, and other major Smart TV brands.

faqs.question: How do I upload playlists to Smart IPTV?
faqs.answer: Upload playlists via the siptv.app website using your TV's MAC address.

name: Televizo
description: Televizo is a modern IPTV player for Android with a clean Material Design interface, EPG support, and multi-screen viewing.
shortDescription: Modern IPTV player with Material Design

faqs.question: Is Televizo free?
faqs.answer: Televizo has a free version. Premium features cost $4.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does Televizo have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Televizo has excellent EPG support with a modern Material Design interface.

faqs.question: Does Televizo support multi-screen?
faqs.answer: Yes, Televizo supports multi-screen viewing on compatible devices.

faqs.question: What devices does Televizo work on?
faqs.answer: Televizo works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: iPlayTV
description: iPlayTV is a premium IPTV player designed exclusively for iOS and Apple TV with native AirPlay support and picture-in-picture.
shortDescription: Premium IPTV player for iOS and Apple TV

faqs.question: Is iPlayTV free?
faqs.answer: No, iPlayTV costs $5.99 one-time with no free version available.

faqs.question: Does iPlayTV support AirPlay?
faqs.answer: Yes, iPlayTV has native AirPlay support for streaming to other Apple devices.

faqs.question: Does iPlayTV have picture-in-picture?
faqs.answer: Yes, iPlayTV supports picture-in-picture mode on compatible devices.

faqs.question: What devices does iPlayTV work on?
faqs.answer: iPlayTV works exclusively on iOS devices and Apple TV.

name: IPTV Pro
description: IPTV Pro is a simple yet effective IPTV player for Android with EPG support and auto-reconnect features.
shortDescription: Simple IPTV player with EPG support

faqs.question: Is IPTV Pro free?
faqs.answer: No, IPTV Pro costs $3.99 one-time with no free version.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Pro have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Pro supports EPG for viewing TV schedules.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Pro have auto-reconnect?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Pro automatically reconnects if your stream drops.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Pro work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Pro works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: Xciptv Player
description: Xciptv (formerly Xtream IPTV Player) is a free player specifically designed for Xtream Codes API with EPG, VOD, and catchup support.
shortDescription: Free Xtream Codes API player

faqs.question: Is Xciptv free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Xciptv is free but contains ads.

faqs.question: Does Xciptv support M3U playlists?
faqs.answer: No, Xciptv only supports Xtream Codes API - not standard M3U playlists.

faqs.question: Does Xciptv have VOD support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Xciptv supports VOD (Video on Demand) content from your provider.

faqs.question: What devices does Xciptv work on?
faqs.answer: Xciptv works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: Stremio
description: Stremio is a modern media center that organizes streaming catalogs and your personal library in one place. Unlike traditional IPTV players that use M3U playlists, Stremio relies on an addon system to add catalogs and features (for example: official streaming services, free-to-watch catalogs, and local media). With account-based sync across devices, subtitle support, and a polished interface, Stremio is a strong choice for users who want a library-style experience. Stremio is free to use; always choose addons and sources that are legal and available in your region.
shortDescription: Free media center with addon ecosystem for streaming movies, TV shows, and live channels
pros: Completely free with no premium tier
Trakt.tv support for tracking watched content
No M3U playlist required - uses addons
Local files support for personal media
cons: No traditional IPTV M3U/Xtream support (uses addons instead)
Some addons require technical knowledge to configure
Live TV options more limited than dedicated IPTV apps
Apple TV requires sideloading (not on App Store)
Addon quality varies - some may be unreliable

faqs.question: Is Stremio legal?
faqs.answer: Stremio itself is legal. It's a media center that doesn't host content. The legality depends on which addons you install and what sources you access through them—stick to legal services and content available in your region.

faqs.question: Does Stremio work with IPTV M3U playlists?
faqs.answer: No, Stremio doesn't natively support M3U playlists like traditional IPTV players. Instead, it uses community addons to access streaming content.

faqs.question: Is Stremio free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Stremio is completely free with no premium tier, no ads, and no subscription required.

faqs.question: How do I install addons in Stremio?
faqs.answer: You can install addons from inside the app. Open the Addons section, select an addon, and install it. Keep your setup minimal and only install addons you trust.

faqs.question: Does Stremio work on Apple TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, but the Apple TV version requires sideloading via AltStore, Sideloadly, or Xcode as it's not available on the App Store.

faqs.question: How do I cast Stremio to Chromecast?
faqs.answer: Start playback, tap the Cast icon, and select your Chromecast device. Casting works best when both devices are on the same network and you use stable 5GHz Wi‑Fi or Ethernet.

faqs.question: Does Stremio sync across devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Stremio syncs your library, addons, and watch progress across all devices when you're signed into your account.

faqs.question: Why does Stremio show “No streams found”?
faqs.answer: It usually means your current addons can't find a playable source for that title. Review your addons, restart the app, and use only legal sources.

name: Duplex IPTV
description: Duplex IPTV is one of the most popular IPTV players for Samsung and LG Smart TVs, offering native apps without sideloading. The player supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API, making it compatible with virtually any IPTV provider. Duplex stands out with its cloud-based playlist management through the XtreamPlayer.com activation portal, allowing easy setup across multiple devices. The interface is clean and TV-optimized with full EPG support, VOD libraries, and catchup TV functionality. While the subscription model requires payment per device, the reliable performance and Smart TV support make it a top choice for users who want IPTV on their television without additional hardware.
shortDescription: Popular Smart TV IPTV player with cloud management
pros: Native Samsung and LG Smart TV apps
Cloud playlist management via web portal
No sideloading required on Smart TVs

faqs.question: Is Duplex IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Duplex IPTV offers a free trial period, then requires a subscription of approximately $0.99/month per device. There is no one-time purchase option.

faqs.question: Does Duplex IPTV work on Samsung TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Duplex IPTV has a native app available in the Samsung App Store, making installation easy without sideloading.

faqs.question: Does Duplex IPTV work on LG TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Duplex IPTV is available in the LG Content Store for webOS Smart TVs.

faqs.question: How do I add playlists to Duplex IPTV?
faqs.answer: You add playlists through the XtreamPlayer.com web portal using your device's activation code. This allows cloud-based management.

faqs.question: Does Duplex IPTV support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Duplex IPTV fully supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API for provider integration.

name: Flix IPTV
description: Flix IPTV is a highly-rated IPTV player available natively on Samsung and LG Smart TVs with a one-time payment model that appeals to users who dislike subscriptions. The app supports M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API, with a well-designed TV interface that's easy to navigate with a remote. Playlist management is handled through the flixiptv.eu web portal where you link your MAC address and upload your subscription details. Flix IPTV includes full EPG support, VOD integration, multi-screen layouts, and parental controls. The one-time purchase covers a single device, but compared to subscription-based alternatives, it offers better long-term value.
shortDescription: One-time purchase Smart TV IPTV player
cons: Interface not as polished as competitors

faqs.question: Is Flix IPTV a one-time payment?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flix IPTV costs $7.99 one-time per device with no recurring subscription required.

faqs.question: Does Flix IPTV work on Samsung TVs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flix IPTV is available as a native app in the Samsung TV App Store.

faqs.question: Does Flix IPTV work on LG TVs?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flix IPTV can be downloaded from the LG Content Store on webOS TVs.

faqs.question: How do I add playlists to Flix IPTV?
faqs.answer: Add playlists through flixiptv.eu website using your TV's MAC address to link your M3U or Xtream credentials.

faqs.question: Does Flix IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flix IPTV supports EPG integration for viewing TV program schedules.

name: SET IPTV
description: SET IPTV is a dedicated Smart TV IPTV player focusing exclusively on Samsung and LG televisions. The app provides a straightforward, no-frills approach to IPTV viewing with support for M3U URLs and Xtream Codes. Setup is handled through the set-iptv.com web portal where you enter your TV's MAC address and playlist credentials. SET IPTV offers reliable EPG support, favorites management, and basic parental controls. While it lacks some advanced features found in competitors, its simplicity and one-time payment model make it attractive for users who want basic IPTV functionality without complexity.
shortDescription: Simple one-time purchase Smart TV IPTV app

faqs.question: Is SET IPTV free?
faqs.answer: SET IPTV offers a 3-day free trial, then requires a one-time payment of $7.49 per device.

faqs.question: Does SET IPTV work on Samsung TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, SET IPTV is available in the Samsung TV app store for Tizen-based Smart TVs.

faqs.question: Does SET IPTV work on LG TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, SET IPTV is available in the LG Content Store for webOS Smart TVs.

faqs.question: How do I activate SET IPTV?
faqs.answer: Activate through set-iptv.com by entering your TV's MAC address and playlist details.

faqs.question: Does SET IPTV support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, SET IPTV supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API.

name: Net IPTV
description: Net IPTV is a lightweight IPTV player primarily designed for Samsung and LG Smart TVs with additional Android support. The app takes a minimalist approach, focusing on core IPTV functionality without bloated features. Playlist management happens through the netiptv.eu web portal using MAC address linking. Net IPTV supports standard M3U playlists and includes basic EPG integration, favorites, and parental controls. The affordable one-time price point makes it budget-friendly, though users seeking advanced features may find it limiting.
shortDescription: Lightweight budget-friendly Smart TV IPTV player

faqs.question: Is Net IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Net IPTV offers a 7-day free trial, then costs $6.59 one-time per device.

faqs.question: Does Net IPTV work on Samsung TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Net IPTV has a native app in the Samsung App Store.

faqs.question: Does Net IPTV work on LG TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Net IPTV is available in the LG Content Store.

faqs.question: How do I set up Net IPTV?
faqs.answer: Set up through netiptv.eu by entering your TV's MAC address and M3U playlist URL.

faqs.question: Does Net IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Net IPTV supports basic EPG functionality when provided with your playlist.

name: Nanomid IPTV Player
description: Nanomid IPTV Player stands out with its integrated VPN functionality, a unique feature that protects your IPTV streaming without needing a separate VPN app. Available across Samsung, LG, Android, iOS, and Fire TV platforms, Nanomid offers a comprehensive streaming solution. The app supports both M3U and Xtream Codes, with excellent EPG integration, VOD support, and multi-playlist management. The cloud sync feature keeps your settings and favorites consistent across all devices. While the subscription model is pricier than alternatives, the built-in VPN and cross-platform sync justify the cost for privacy-conscious users.
shortDescription: Multi-platform IPTV player with integrated VPN

faqs.question: Does Nanomid have a built-in VPN?
faqs.answer: Yes, Nanomid includes an integrated VPN feature to protect your IPTV streaming without needing a separate VPN app.

faqs.question: Is Nanomid IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Nanomid offers a free trial, then requires a subscription of approximately $4.99/month.

faqs.question: What devices does Nanomid support?
faqs.answer: Nanomid works on Samsung TV, LG TV, Android phones/tablets, iOS, Fire TV, and Android TV.

faqs.question: Does Nanomid sync across devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Nanomid has cloud sync that keeps your playlists, favorites, and settings consistent across all your devices.

faqs.question: Does Nanomid support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Nanomid supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API.

name: OTTPlayer
description: OTTPlayer is a completely free IPTV player with native support for Samsung and LG Smart TVs plus desktop and mobile platforms. The app uses cloud-based playlist management through ottplayer.es, allowing you to upload M3U playlists via the web and sync across all your devices. While the interface is more basic than premium alternatives, OTTPlayer delivers reliable playback with EPG support and channel organization. The fact that it's completely free with no trial limitations or premium tiers makes it popular among budget-conscious IPTV users.
shortDescription: Free cloud-synced IPTV player for Smart TVs
pros: No registration required for basic use

faqs.question: Is OTTPlayer completely free?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTTPlayer is 100% free with no premium tier, subscription, or hidden costs.

faqs.question: Does OTTPlayer work on Samsung TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTTPlayer has a native app available in the Samsung App Store.

faqs.question: Does OTTPlayer work on LG TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTTPlayer is available in the LG Content Store for webOS TVs.

faqs.question: How do I add playlists to OTTPlayer?
faqs.answer: Upload playlists through the ottplayer.es website, then they sync automatically to your devices.

faqs.question: Does OTTPlayer have cloud sync?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTTPlayer syncs playlists and settings across all your devices through cloud storage.

name: IPTVnator
description: IPTVnator is a free, open-source IPTV player built specifically for desktop platforms using Electron and Angular. Unlike web-based solutions, IPTVnator runs as a native application on Windows, macOS, and Linux with full hardware decoding support. The app features a modern interface, multi-playlist management, EPG integration, and channel grouping. Being open-source means the code is transparent and community-driven, with no ads, tracking, or subscription requirements. IPTVnator is ideal for users who prefer watching IPTV on their computer rather than mobile or TV devices.
shortDescription: Open-source desktop IPTV player

faqs.question: Is IPTVnator free?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTVnator is completely free and open-source with no premium features or subscriptions.

faqs.question: Does IPTVnator work on Windows?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTVnator has native Windows builds available on GitHub releases.

faqs.question: Does IPTVnator work on Mac?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTVnator is available for macOS through GitHub releases.

faqs.question: Does IPTVnator work on Linux?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTVnator supports Linux with AppImage, Snap, and other package formats.

faqs.question: Is IPTVnator open-source?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTVnator is fully open-source and available on GitHub under MIT license.

name: MyIPTV Player
description: MyIPTV Player is a free IPTV application available exclusively through the Microsoft Store for Windows 10 and 11. The app provides a simple, straightforward way to watch M3U playlists on your Windows PC with EPG support and channel organization. Being a Microsoft Store app means easy installation, automatic updates, and security verification. MyIPTV Player supports local and remote M3U files, external EPG sources, and basic favorites management. While lacking advanced features found in dedicated media centers, its simplicity makes it ideal for Windows users wanting basic IPTV functionality.
shortDescription: Free Microsoft Store IPTV app for Windows

faqs.question: Is MyIPTV Player free?
faqs.answer: Yes, MyIPTV Player is completely free to download and use from the Microsoft Store.

faqs.question: Does MyIPTV Player work on Windows 11?
faqs.answer: Yes, MyIPTV Player is compatible with both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

faqs.question: How do I install MyIPTV Player?
faqs.answer: Install directly from the Microsoft Store by searching for 'MyIPTV Player' or visiting the app page.

faqs.question: Does MyIPTV Player have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, MyIPTV Player supports EPG from external XMLTV sources.

faqs.question: Can MyIPTV Player use local M3U files?
faqs.answer: Yes, MyIPTV Player supports both local M3U files and remote URLs.

name: Purple IPTV Player
description: Purple IPTV Player is a modern Android IPTV application with a focus on clean design and cloud synchronization. The app supports M3U and Xtream Codes playlists with full EPG integration, VOD support, and catchup TV functionality. Purple Player's standout feature is its cloud sync capability, allowing you to maintain consistent settings and favorites across multiple Android devices. The interface is visually appealing with customizable themes and a responsive remote-friendly design for Fire TV. The free version includes basic features with the premium unlock removing ads and enabling advanced functionality.
shortDescription: Modern Android IPTV player with cloud sync

faqs.question: Is Purple IPTV Player free?
faqs.answer: Purple IPTV has a free version with ads. Premium costs $4.99 one-time for full features.

faqs.question: Does Purple IPTV work on Fire TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Purple IPTV Player is optimized for Fire TV and Firestick devices.

faqs.question: Does Purple IPTV have cloud sync?
faqs.answer: Yes, Purple IPTV syncs your playlists, favorites, and settings across all your Android devices.

faqs.question: Does Purple IPTV support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Purple IPTV Player supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API.

faqs.question: Does Purple IPTV have VOD support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Purple IPTV includes VOD and catchup TV functionality.

name: Sparkle TV
description: Sparkle TV is an Android TV and Fire TV focused IPTV player with strong DVR recording capabilities and Stalker portal support. The app is designed specifically for big-screen viewing with a leanback interface optimized for remote control navigation. Sparkle TV supports M3U, Xtream Codes, and Stalker middleware, making it compatible with virtually any IPTV provider. The recording feature allows you to save live TV to external storage, while EPG integration and catchup TV enhance the viewing experience. The premium subscription unlocks advanced features including unlimited recordings and multi-profile support.
shortDescription: Android TV player with DVR and Stalker support

faqs.question: Does Sparkle TV support recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sparkle TV has DVR functionality to record live TV to external USB storage.

faqs.question: Does Sparkle TV support Stalker portal?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sparkle TV supports Stalker middleware in addition to M3U and Xtream Codes.

faqs.question: Does Sparkle TV work on Firestick?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sparkle TV is available for Firestick and Fire TV devices.

faqs.question: Is Sparkle TV free?
faqs.answer: Sparkle TV has a free version with limited features. Premium is $9.99/year for full functionality.

faqs.question: Does Sparkle TV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sparkle TV includes full EPG support for TV guide functionality.

name: VU IPTV Player
description: VU IPTV Player is a premium iOS and Apple TV IPTV application supporting both Xtream Codes and Stalker portal middleware. The app features a native Apple design with AirPlay support, picture-in-picture, and smooth integration with the Apple ecosystem. VU supports M3U playlists, Xtream Codes API, and MAG/Stalker portals, making it versatile for different IPTV provider types. The EPG integration is well-implemented, and VOD content is easily accessible. While the App Store presence limits some features compared to sideloaded alternatives, VU Player offers reliability and easy installation for Apple users.
shortDescription: Premium iOS IPTV player with Stalker support

faqs.question: Is VU IPTV Player free?
faqs.answer: No, VU IPTV Player costs $6.99 one-time with no free version available.

faqs.question: Does VU IPTV support Stalker portal?
faqs.answer: Yes, VU IPTV Player supports Stalker/MAG portal middleware in addition to M3U and Xtream.

faqs.question: Does VU IPTV work on Apple TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, VU IPTV Player is available for Apple TV through the App Store.

faqs.question: Does VU IPTV support AirPlay?
faqs.answer: Yes, VU IPTV includes AirPlay support for streaming to other Apple devices.

faqs.question: Does VU IPTV have picture-in-picture?
faqs.answer: Yes, VU IPTV supports picture-in-picture mode on compatible iOS devices.

name: Flex IPTV
description: Flex IPTV is an affordable iOS and Apple TV IPTV player available directly from the App Store. The app supports M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API with a focus on simplicity and ease of use. Flex IPTV includes EPG support, VOD browsing, favorites management, and AirPlay casting. The interface is clean and Apple-native feeling, with support for picture-in-picture viewing. At $4.99 one-time, it's one of the more affordable options for Apple users seeking a reliable, no-fuss IPTV player without the complexity of sideloading.
shortDescription: Affordable iOS IPTV player from App Store

faqs.question: Is Flex IPTV free?
faqs.answer: No, Flex IPTV costs $4.99 one-time from the App Store.

faqs.question: Does Flex IPTV work on Apple TV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flex IPTV is available for both iOS and Apple TV through the App Store.

faqs.question: Does Flex IPTV support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flex IPTV supports both M3U playlists and Xtream Codes API.

faqs.question: Does Flex IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flex IPTV includes EPG support for viewing TV guide information.

faqs.question: Does Flex IPTV support AirPlay?
faqs.answer: Yes, Flex IPTV includes AirPlay support for casting to Apple TV and other devices.
